EmailTemplate.description: Email template to inform customer that they have not scheduled a call with one of our onboarding specialists. CSP-2534
EmailTemplate.name: Follow Up 1 - Get Started Auto
EmailTemplate.subject: Get Started With The Knot [{!Case.Thread_Id}]
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Your Account Strategist team here at The Knot, reaching out! We’re your go-to support team, to help ensure your Storefront makes the best first impression with couples.
I tried giving you a buzz today, but unfortunately we weren’t able to connect. I’d like to set up a quick call to help get your Storefront up and running, and go through the tools and resources you can use to manage your leads.
To easily schedule a call at your convenience, I’ve included a link to schedule. Please pick the date/time that works best for you, or give us a call.
Talk soon!
